message_1:
Suppose we want to find the minimum value of the function f(x) = x^4 - 8x^3 + 18x^2 - 10x + 1 using gradient descent method.

Starting from an initial guess x_0 = 0, find the minimum value of the function by taking 10 iterations using a learning rate of 0.1.
message_2:
To perform gradient descent, we need to find the derivative of the function f(x) with respect to x, which will give us the gradient at any point x. The derivative of f(x) is:

f'(x) = 4x^3 - 24x^2 + 36x - 10

Now, we will perform 10 iterations of gradient descent using the given learning rate (α = 0.1) and the initial guess (x_0 = 0).

Iteration 1:
x_1 = x_0 - α * f'(x_0)
x_1 = 0 - 0.1 * (-10)
x_1 = 1

Iteration 2:
x_2 = x_1 - α * f'(x_1)
x_2 = 1 - 0.1 * (4 - 24 + 36 - 10)
x_2 = 1 - 0.1 * 6
x_2 = 0.4

Iteration 3:
x_3 = x_2 - α * f'(x_2)
x_3 = 0.4 - 0.1 * (4(0.4)^3 - 24(0.4)^2 + 36(0.4) - 10)
x_3 ≈ 0.568

Iteration 4:
x_4 = x_3 - α * f'(x_3)
x_4 ≈ 0.568 - 0.1 * (4(0.568)^3 - 24(0.568)^2 + 36(0.568) - 10)
x_4 ≈ 0.669

Iteration 5:
x_5 = x_4 - α * f'(x_4)
x_5 ≈ 0.669 - 0.1 * (4(0.669)^3 - 24(0.669)^2 + 36(0.669) - 10)
x_5 ≈ 0.724

Iteration 6:
x_6 = x_5 - α * f'(x_5)
x_6 ≈ 0.724 - 0.1 * (4(0.724)^3 - 24(0.724)^2 + 36(0.724) - 10)
x_6 ≈ 0.751

Iteration 7:
x_7 = x_6 - α * f'(x_6)
x_7 ≈ 0.751 - 0.1 * (4(0.751)^3 - 24(0.751)^2 + 36(0.751) - 10)
x_7 ≈ 0.763

Iteration 8:
x_8 = x_7 - α * f'(x_7)
x_8 ≈ 0.763 - 0.1 * (4(0.763)^3 - 24(0.763)^2 + 36(0.763) - 10)
x_8 ≈ 0.768

Iteration 9:
x_9 = x_8 - α * f'(x_8)
x_9 ≈ 0.768 - 0.1 * (4(0.768)^3 - 24(0.768)^2 + 36(0.768) - 10)
x_9 ≈ 0.770

Iteration 10:
x_10 = x_9 - α * f'(x_9)
x_10 ≈ 0.770 - 0.1 * (4(0.770)^3 - 24(0.770)^2 + 36(0.770) - 10)
x_10 ≈ 0.771

After 10 iterations, our estimate for the minimum value of x is x_10 ≈ 0.771. Now, we can find the minimum value of the function f(x) using this estimate:

f(x_10) ≈ (0.771)^4 - 8(0.771)^3 + 18(0.771)^2 - 10(0.771) + 1
f(x_10) ≈ -6.542

Thus, the minimum value of the function f(x) after 10 iterations using gradient descent with a learning rate of 0.1 is approximately -6.542.
